name: Zombie Car Drifting 3D
description:
Get ready to take down the zombie squad after the world has been taken over by a massive zombie apocalypse. Sit behind the wheels of some deathly zombie derby car, designed and equipped with state of the art weapons for zombie survival in this time of zombie crisis. You will have to perform some deathly zombie drift stunts on the highway or in the zombie arena & survive the attacks of dead in a thrilling roadkill game.


The rules of zombie roadkill are simple, survive the hordes of unkilled zombie rush heading your way, take down as many dead zombies as you can and put an end to this zombie crisis apocalypse. This game is going to put you in the midst of a dead city taken over by the unkilled zombie apocalypse, to put your zombie survival skills to ultimate roadkill test. Drive on the highway of dead city and put the dead back to rest in an epic thrilling zombie derby game.


You are the lone survivor of the zombie strike & fighting the zombie rush till your last breath is your only option. Zombie survival and roadkill is no piece of cake, imagine the horrors of undead zombie war roaming around on the loose, ready to attack you any given moment. Survive the waves of zombie crisis and be part of the ultimate zombie squad and kill as many zombies in this zombie war era as you can to put an end to this outbreak of epidemic disease.


Its time to sit in your massive zombie drift killer car, and take down the hordes of zombies, fight for the ultimate survival horror against the zombie strike.
